(Someone post damage for the CF, Airly post damage for Condor, and IR, post 
damage for IRIS and Iron Raptor.  Also, Carnage, Sun Crusher is a tank so, he 
really has no midsection at the moment)


Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector/Unicron/Groove/Streetwise/Shockwave:




Vehement felt some blasts, but was relatively unhurt thanks a great deal of 
armor.  Raising his right arm, the sword it held shot out three bolts of 
laser energy at Hot Rod.

---

Sun Crusher felt Dinobot's blast, which didn't do anything because of heavy 
armor.  Some shots from another robot dug into his armored form, but didn't 
damage anything vital.  The large cannon of the turret turned to focus on 
Dinobot, launching a single missile at the Maximal.

The small cannon on the turret focused in on the Cybertronian Fire, letting 
loose a large arc of sonic energy in the ship's general direction.

---

Reflector fell to a knee from blasts, and looked over to the disguised 
Unicron, smiling.  He leapt into the air, a rifle forming in his left hand 
from subspace.  Raising the rifle, he fired a single long spurt of green acid 
at Firearm.  Raising his right arm, he aimed his rapid-firing missile 
launcher, firing off two missiles at the Cybertronian Fire.

---

The disguised Unicron charged up his optic sensors, firing off three rapid 
blasts at Prowl.

---

Shockwave arrived on scene, sending an inner monologue transmission to 
Unitron and getting a response.  Receiving a target lock, the Decepticon 
warrior let loose two missiles at the Cybertronian Fire.

Sending an inner monologue transmission to Hell Beast, his sing-song voice 
unforgettable.  "Hell Beast, if we must retreat, head for the Brotherhood 
base."

---

Streetwise transformed to his police car mode, Groove inside of him, and 
drove out of the Cybertronian Fire, scanning for a target to bash.
